createAccountToApp.subject: [OORT] {{senderName}} has invited you to join the {{appName}} application
createAccountToApp.accessInfo: To access this app, please follow these simple steps:
createAccountToApp.clickOn: and click on the and click on the Register button to create your account. Be careful to use the same email address than this one!
createAccountToApp.validateEmail: Validate your email address with the email sent to you.
createAccountToApp.openApplication: Open the application with the button below and enjoy!
createAccountToApp.noteContent: You can only create your account during the 7 days following the reception of this email. If the invitation has expired, please ask the owner of the application to send you another invitation.
createAccountToApp.accessDirectly: You can also access the application page directly at:

createAccount.registerAndValidate: Validate your account and enjoy all the features of Oort!
